name: Pact Bat ReVamped
description:
You’ve made a Pact with The Reaper to achieve great power in life. However, now you’ve died and have been confined to his realm as a lowly bat. Escape The Reaper’s jaws and move on to a better afterlife by collecting his bones and beating his trials.

TIPS: Use WASD to move and Esc to pause. Moving diagonally also makes you move faster. 

*Pact Bat is a work in progress game. I plan to come back to it throughout my Computer Science degree to add more levels and polish. However, I would appreciate you giving it a try and leaving a comment on your experience*
